 <\/p>

Togetherness is not just a slogan; it is the spirit that drives our vision and mission. In the journey to excellence, our efforts cannot stand alone. It requires synergy between students, academic staff, administrators, alumni, and industry partners to foster creating academic excellence and forming an inclusive, progressive, and respected bumiputra community.<\/span><\/p>


Being a \"Globally Renowned University<\/strong>\" is this year's theme, and it must be adequately anchored for us to carry on and reap its benefits throughout the ensuing 10 years.<\/span><\/p>


<\/span>Professor Datuk Ts. Dr. Shahrin bin Sahib @ Sahibuddin, FASc <\/strong><\/span>
